title: I bought some Riot points and they haven't been added to my account yet. Please help.
body: I bought them about two hours ago and still haven't received an email or gotten them in-game. Please help. i want Elderwood Bard {{champion:432}} baaaaaaad. lol. help

replies.body: i suggest you contact the support as the RP purchase was bugged recently and i think thats the reason why u havent received it yet and when u do provide evidence that u really did purchase the RP.

I will be sure to contact the support. I am not sure if i can provide evidence though, I did use PayPal so it should send an email to me if it did go through. if it didn't go through it probably just glitched out and maybe it didn't charge me so i might just have to buy it again.

If it went through on the paypal side, definitely hit us up in that [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and provide the PayPal transaction ID or a screenshot of it and we'll help you out. ^.^
